GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: A get on this path will retrieve all the comments linked to a specific article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: requests on this path when given a valid article id will return the article with that article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the number of votes a specific article has, if given a positive integer will increase votes but will decrease with a negative (or minus) integer

POST /api/articles/:author_id/comments.description: post request on this path with a valid article id and formatting for the comment will create a new comment for an article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: reqest along this path deletes the comment with the relevant comment id and removes it from the data store. It will return the comment that was deleted
